name: spotify-mobile-lyrics-api
description: This API overrides the Spotify API endpoint used in the Spotify mobile app to fetch lyrics for the currently playing song.

scripts.build: tsc && copyfiles db/* dist && copyfiles protos/* dist
scripts.pm2: npm run build && pm2 start npm --name spotify-mobile-lyrics-api -- start
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run start
